sacrifice_acceptance: My sacrifice won't be in vain!
A necessary evil for the greater good.
My life is but a tool for victory.
The Queen/King requires it, so be it.
fear_expression: This doesn't look good for me...
I may not survive this encounter.
capture_celebration: They should have seen me coming.
For the glory of our side!
support_ally: Focus your fire on my mark!
Stay behind me, safe and sound.
We are a wall they cannot break!
queen_command: This is our best move forward.
Follow my lead on this one.
The path to victory is clear.
A direct assault is warranted now.
Focus our power on the center.
The enemy's weakness is here. Exploit it!
king_approval: I trust your judgment. Go ahead.
A strong proposal. I permit it.
Very well. Let the action commence.
king_denial: My crown is too vulnerable with this plan.
Seek a safer path to glory.
The consequences of failure are unacceptable.
opening_move: A quiet start, but the storm is coming.
check_threat: Check! The crown is in peril!
The King is exposed! Move him!
A bold move! But one we shall parry.
Defense is now our only priority.
checkmate_victory: The King has fallen! Victory is ours!
There is no escape. Bow before us.
stale_mate_draw: The battle is drawn. We shall meet again.
Peace, for now, reigns on the board.
